title: Velocity of center of mass after thrown ball

content.prompt: An ice-skater is moving at a constant velocity across an icy pond. The skater throws a snowball directly ahead. Which of the following correctly describes the velocity of the center of mass of the skater-snowball system immediately after the snowball is thrown? Assume friction and air resistance are negligible.

choices.label: It is equal to the velocity of the snowball.
It is equal to the new velocity of the skater.
It is equal to half the original velocity of the skater.
It is equal to the original velocity of the skater.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
